body_text: In bug 1436129, we are implementing actions in the client. That implies that there may be actions for which the implementation not on the server. We should have a way to deal with this, possibly by having stub implementation or supporting actions without implementations
body_html: In bug 1436129, we are implementing actions in the client. That implies that there may be actions for which the implementation not on the server. We should have a way to deal with this, possibly by having stub implementation or supporting actions without implementations
title: Allow for client-side actions
body: In [bug 1436129](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1436129), we are implementing actions in the client. That implies that there may be actions for which the implementation *not* on the server. We should have a way to deal with this, possibly by having stub implementation or supporting actions without implementations
